Title: Relates to the grounds for which the public employment relations board may seek injunctive relief
Summary: Relates to the grounds for which the public employment relations board may seek injunctive relief; defines "irreparable injury, loss or damage".
LawCode: Amd §209-a, Civ Serv L; amd §§6301 & 6313, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the grounds for which the public employment relations board may seek injunctive relief
